11533222222222222211121.content:
{Authors note: The fall on Goku's head killed him in this story so Krillin has to step up and be the hero..no pressure right?}

In the remote region of Mount Paozu we find a young monk named Krillin in the middle of his morning training. Foraging and hunting for food, cutting down trees and riding on top of the logs he made down steep hills and cliffs then copping the logs into firewood, all with just his bare hands and feet. And that's just his morning training. When he first came here to train under Master Gohan 1.5 years ago doing just this took him all day to finish and it was terrifying to the young Martial Artist(he nearly died at least a dozen times in just the first month) but he stuck to it and now this was just a normal morning for him.

"I wonder what Master has in mind for my training today." Krillin mused to himself. Master Gohan always had a new way to test him and make training more difficult to the point that it was life threatening. If he didn't know any better he would think that the old man was trying to kill him. But Gohan always put a stop to things before they became too dangerous and nursed his student back to health afterward. Plus the old man was funny, wise, kind and polite, traits that he hoped rubbed off on him.

"AAAAAHHHHHH!!!!! SOMEONE HELP ME!!!!" the scream echoed throughout the valley and startled him so much he nearly fell off his log. Krillin looked around frantically for the source of the scream before seeing a giant Pterodactyl carrying a girl in his claws.

"Not today!!" he shouted rather heroically as he jumped off his log, soaring up to the flying dinosaur and kicked it in the face so hard that it's neck snapped and dropped the girl. She screamed in fright as she fell thinking that this was the end for her, only to be saved by Krillin as he wrapped his arms around her and broke her fall with his own body. The girl thought that the little boy who saved her was dead, after all no human being could survive a fall from over a hundred feet..right?

"Are you alright miss?" said a muffled voice. The girl looked down to see that the boy was in fact alive and his face was buried in her huge bosom. Normally this would fill her with rage, but she was so relieved to be alive that she actually hugged him deeper into her bust in sheer gratitude.

"OH THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!!! I thought was a goner for sure!!" she spinned him around in joy.

"No problem ma'am.." he sigh with a dopey smile on his red face.

After a minute of basking in the joy of being alive the girl introduced herself as Bulma Briefs and that she was out here searching for The Dragon Balls, mystical orbs that when gathered together have the power to grant wishes. Krillin was sceptical at first but after Bulma showed him the Dragon Balls she had on her person he recognized them as the same ball that his Master had on display in his house,only with a different number of stars. She the explained that there are seven balls in total each with 1 up to 7 stars on them and the one that his Master had was 4. So maybe there was some truth to what she was saying. So Krillin took Bulma to his Master to see what he had to say about this. It turns out that Gohan had heard tales of The Dragon Balls and asked Bulma what she would wish for if she found them.

"I going to wish for the perfect boyfriend!" she stated with pride.

Gohan and Krillin looked at each other with a flat look on their faces before shaking their heads in amusement. A selfish but harmless wish. So Gohan decided to give Bulma his Dragon Ball and send Krillin with her to not only protect her but to see for himself if the legend of The Dragon Balls was indeed true. Plus this would be a great opportunity to really put his training to the test and to good use.

"Don't you worry Master. I won't let you down." Krillin said with determination. Gohan simply smiled at his eager young pupil.

"I know my boy."



Krillin's power level before Gohan's training: 18

Krillin's current power level: 58
11533222222222222211121.title: Krillin's grand adventure begins!

115332222222222222111211.content:
Krillin and Bulma have just began their journey and their first night together was awkward to say the least. After taking his first bath in what felt like years he was chilling on the couch in the portable house that Bulma had set up for them watching T.V. But as he was relaxing without a care in the world he heard something coming from the bathroom.

"Ah..Ohh.."

It almost sounded like Bulma was moaning in pain. [Maybe she pulled a muscle or something.] he thought to himself. Concerned for his new friend he walk to the bathroom to see if she was okay. But just as his hand was about to touch the doorknob he remembered that she was taking a bath probably didn't want to be disturbed.

"Oh god..Mmm.."

[Just a quick peek. Just to see if she's okay.] the flustered monk thought to himself as he silently opened the door a bit. He then immediately closed it as he found out that Bulma wasn't moaning in pain but in pleasure as she was masturbating in the bathtub. And he was now cursing and thanking Master Gohan for training him so well at taking in all of his surroundings down to the smallest detail. It was only for a split second but Krillin got a full view of the young woman in all her naked glory. He had already knew that Bulma was a very pretty girl but now he knew just how beautiful she truly was. Her long wet purple hair, her big sapphire blue eyes, her long perfectly toned legs connected to a plump heart shaped ass and of course her round, perky F-cup sized breasts.

"That's it honey..Mmm..suck my nipple harder."

She was no doubt imagining having some "fun time" with the boyfriend she was planning to wish for. And Krillin could perfectly see her in his minds eye pulling and twisting her nipple while playing with her small pink pussy. He then decided it would be best if he went out to find a cold waterfall to meditate under and maybe hunt for some food while he was at it.

"Hey Bulma! I'm heading out to hunt for a while!" he called out as he slipped on his shoes and equipped The Power Pole that his master gave him "Don't wait up for me I'll be back!" he didn't wait to hear her response as he bolted with great speed into the woods hopping and swinging through the trees with effortless ease. He didn't return until he was fully calmed down a few hours later. By the time he got back Bulma was sound asleep. So he unfolded his sleeping mat and joined her in dreamland.

The next morning Krillin was pushing and lifting some large boulders for some improvised training. But one of the rocks turned out to be a large talking sea turtle. He said that he was lost trying to find his way back to the sea. After looking at her map Bulma informed the poor turtle that he still had over 100 miles to go to get there. Such a voyage would take the slow creature 20 years if he didn't die first. Or at least it would have if Krillin didn't volunteer to carry the turtle to the sea himself. Bulma protested saying that they didn't have time for this, but Krillin refused to abandon the helpless animal and just place Turtle on his back took off towards the sea. Now Bulma would never admit it out loud but she knew that she was helpless without Krillin and needed his help to find The Dragon Balls. Plus she did admire his kindness and determination to help those in need. So she got on her motorcycle and followed after him.

It turns out that their little detour wouldn't take forever as Bulma feared it would as even with a turtle that must weigh about 200 pounds on his back Krillin was still very fast and they found themselves just 2 miles from the beach in just over 4 hours. But before they could make it much further a Bear Bandit block their path and he looked hungry.

"Alright kid if you know what's good for ya you'll had over the turtle. I haven't had turtle soup in a long time." he demanded while licking his chops.

"No." Krillin simply said.

Bulma stared at him in disbelief "Are you out of your mind kid?! Just drop the turtle and lets get out of here!"

"No." he said again.

The Bandit just chuckled at the kids bravery thinking he'll make short work of him and have him and the girl as an appetizer. "Very well kid it's your funeral." he boasted as he drew his sword. Krillin wasn't intimidated in the slightest even as a sword over 3 times his size was being swung at him. Within the blink of an eye he tossed Turtle at Bulma who was now trapped under the heavy animal and caught the sword in between his palms. "WHAT?!?!" the Bandit shouted in shock. The in another blink Krillin snapped the sword in half and kicked the Bear in the stomach so hard he went flying into a mountain side and cause a small rock slide to fall on top of him.

With the threat now taken care of Krillin walked over to a still trapped Bulma who was a quite pissed at him."What the hell is the matter with you?!?! You could have killed me!!"

"Apologize." he stated firmly crossing his arms.

Bulma was taken aback by his command, but quickly regained her fervor. "Why should I have to apologize?! You're the one who threw a turtle at me!"

"And YOU are the one who was willing to abandon an innocent life just to save your own skin." he countered "I came on this journey not only to protect you Bulma but to make sure that The Dragon Balls don't fall into the wrong hands. That includes YOU if it comes to it Bulma. So I'm not going to help you any further until you apologize to Turtle. Now."

Bulma was completely stunned. Never in all her life had some one called her out like that, not even her father. In fact if she was completely honest with herself she was very spoiled. She was used to getting what she wanted because she was both a pretty girl and very rich. As she thought back to her words earlier she felt ashamed of herself. She looked to Turtle and said meekly "I'm sorry."

The old sea dweller simply smiled "It's okay. No harm done." His kind reassurance only made her fell guiltier. She was fully willing to let him be eaten and he just forgave her?

After returning him to the sea Turtle asked his new friends to wait for him so he could bring them a gift. And so they waited in awkward silence for over an hour before Turtle returned with an old man with a big purple turtle shell on his back.

"Hello there. I'm Roshi the Turtle Hermit." the old man introduced himself as he hopped onto the shore.

"Wait. Your name is Roshi?!" Krillin asked in excitement.

"That's my name kid. Don't wear it out."

"Wow! I heard so much about you from Master Gohan! It's an honor to meet you sir." the young monk bowed his head in respect for the martial arts legend.

"Gohan hmm?" he pondered out loud while stroking his beard "Now there is a name I haven't heard in a long time. I take it you're a student of his?"

"I sure am!" Krillin said with pride.

"Well then it's no wonder you helped my turtle. Gohan always was a kind and pure soul." Roshi said with a voice full of fond nostalgia "So it makes since that his student would be as well."

"Well I don't know about that." Krillin said modestly while rubbing the back of his head "I just did what I thought was right."

"I see." The hermit said thoughtfully as he noticed the Power Pole on his back. That confirmed that this young man was some one Gohan absolutely trusted otherwise he would never part with it.[I wonder.] he pondered in his head. "Well then I suppose it's time for your gift." He then pointed his staff to the sky and yelled dramatically "COME TO ME FLYING NIMBUS!!!" After a few seconds of silence a small yellow cloud came flying towards them at high speed before stopping right in front of them.

"Wow." said Krillin in awe.

"It's a cloud?" asked Bulma both astounded and confused.

"This cloud is a very special treasure of mine." Roshi explained "Those who ride it are capable of flying on par with the finest aircraft. But it only allows those who are pure of heart to ride it. It's rather picky that way. Here let my show you how it's done." the old man jumped onto the cloud only to fall right through it and land hard on his ass.

"You must have done something very naughty master." teased Turtle.

"Oh shut up you!!" Roshi yelled comically as he picked himself off the ground.

"Can I give it a try master?" Krillin asked tentatively.

"Go ahead." Roshi said nonchalantly "If you can ride it, it's all yours."

Krillin gulped down a lump in his throat as he stared at the magic cloud unsure if he was ready for this. After all he was a bit of a jerk when he first started training with Gohan. But he took a deep breath gathering his courage and made the jump.


Bear Bandit power level: 18

Bulma power level: 4

In a dark alleyway in downtown Jump city a common thug was running from the police after robbing a convenience store. Little did he know that someone else was also after him..someone far more dangerous.

"Didn't your parents ever tell you that stealing is wrong?" echoed a rather cheery voice that ordinarily would be pleasant to hear, but to the thug it was the voice of doom. Something about it made every instinct he had telling him to run and hide. He grabbed his crowbar hoping that it would give him a chance to fight off whatever was after him. It didn't.

In five seconds the thug was disarmed and his face was smashed into a wall so hard left a perfect imprint. "I'm guessing that's a no." said the voice in good humor. The voice belonged to Garfield Mark Logan formally known as Beast Boy of the Doom Patrol. After leaving the Doom Patrol to be his own hero 6 years ago he had a fight with a small time villain named Adonis that exposed him to some chemicals that further mutated his shape shifting powers and awakened a Beast in him. It made him more aggressive and primal, even made him eat meat even though he was a strict vegetarian. It got so bad that he nearly killed the criminals that he fought on nearly daily basis. And this caught the attention of Batman who after an intense fight to stop the Beast from killing took Garfield under his wing to help him better control his primal instincts. After 3 years of intense training Garfield was back to his old self only much stronger, wiser, more mature and even willing to eat meat since it helped him get taller and put actual muscle on his bones.

Before he was a little green bean of 100 pounds and barely 5 feet tall. Now he was a towering 6'2 feet and 180 pounds of solid muscle. He also changed his wardrobe from his old Doom Patrol uniform to a tunic made of grizzly bear fur, gauntlets made of tiger fur and claws, wolfs fur boots and a cape of lions fur with a hood of the lions head and mane. All from animals that he fairly hunted and killed. It was part of his training, in order to master the Beast within he had to accept it as a part of who he is and become one with nature in all it cruel beauty. He lived as most of every animal he can change into for weeks at a time, from a rabbit to an elephant, from a wolf, lion, tiger, bear(oh my) and a shark. Forging, hunting, surviving and as a BIG side benefit taking down lots of poachers and animal traffickers. It a helped him to understand that no matter how much we evolve we are all still part of the circle of life and that deep down we are still animals. And that is how he got his new hero name Animal.

We now find our hero on top of a building taking in the scenery of his new home for the foreseeable future. "I think I'm going to like it here." he said to himself with confidence. Just then what looked like a green shooting star crash landed a few miles away from him. "Oh yeah I'm REALLY going to like it here." he said as changed into an eagle, eager to face the challenge ahead.
